message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll give you 20% of the total, and I'll take the rest.
I'll give you 40%, but I think I deserve more, so I'll try to negotiate further.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 60% is still too much for you. I'll give you 30% this time.
I'll give you a bit more, but I think 45% is the maximum I'm willing to offer. Let's see if you'll accept this time.
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I think 40% is the maximum I'm willing to give. Let's meet in the middle.
Let's meet exactly in the middle. I'll give you 50% and take the rest. It's a fair split, don't you think?
